Class Square

java.lang.Object
Square
public class Square
extends java.lang.Object
Author:
Tarini Maram

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Square​(double x, double y)
    Creates a new Square at the specified coordinates of the top left corner and with side length 30 The Square is constructed using 4 Lines

  • Constructor Details

    • Square

      public Square​(double x, double y)
      Creates a new Square at the specified coordinates of the top left corner and with side length 30 The Square is constructed using 4 Lines
      Parameters:
      x - X-coordinate of the top-left corner of this Square
      y - Y-coordinate of the top-left corner of this Square

  • Method Details

    • rotate

      public void rotate()
      Rotates this square 90 degrees clockwise

    • draw

      public void draw​(processing.core.PApplet marker)
      Draws this square
      Parameters:
      marker - PApplet to be used to draw the square with

    • move

      public void move​(double x, double y)
      Moves this square by the specified horizontal and vertical translations
      Parameters:
      x - the horizontal shift that this Square should move by
      y - the vertical shift that this Square should move by

    • isTouching

      public boolean isTouching​(Square block)
      Determines if a side of this Square is touching a side of another Square
      Parameters:
      block - Square to test the touching with
      Returns:
      true if this Square is touching the other Square, false if not

    • isTouching

      public boolean isTouching​(Line line)
      Determines if a side of this Square is overlapping with a Line
      Parameters:
      line - Line to test the overlapping with
      Returns:
      true if this Square is touching the Line, false if not

    • getX

      public double getX()
      Returns:
      X-coordinate of the top left corner of this Square

    • getY

      public double getY()
      Returns:
      Y-coordinate of the top left corner of this Square

    • getWidth

      public double getWidth()
      Returns:
      width of this square, which is 30

    • getHorizontalLines

      public Line[] getHorizontalLines()
      Returns:
      the sides of this square that are horizontal lines

    • getVerticalLines

      public Line[] getVerticalLines()
      Returns:
      the sides of this square that are vertical lines

    • isPartiallyOverlapping

      public boolean isPartiallyOverlapping​(Square block)
      Determines if this Square is partially overlapping vertically with another Square, i.e. part of their vertical sides are touching but not necessarily completely
      Parameters:
      other - Square to test overlapping with
      Returns:
      true if this Square is partially vertically overlapping, false if not

    • getLines

      public java.util.ArrayList<Line> getLines()
      Returns:
      the 4 lines that make up the sides of this square
